AlwaysSample.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether traces should ALWAYS be captured. Default value: false.

EgressIgnorePattern.description: Gets or sets a regular expression for requests leaving this application that should not be traced. Default value: "/api/v2/spans|/v2/apps/.*/permissions|/eureka/*"

ExporterEndpoint.description: Gets or sets the endpoint used for exporting traces.

IngressIgnorePattern.description: Gets or sets a regular expression for requests coming into this application that should not be traced. Default value: "/actuator/.*|/cloudfoundryapplication/.*|.*\\.png|.*\\.css|.*\\.js|.*\\.html|/favicon.ico|.*\\.gif"

MaxPayloadSizeInBytes.description: Gets or sets the maximum payload size in bytes. Default value: 4096.

NeverSample.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether traces should NEVER be captured. Default value: false.

PropagationType.description: Gets or sets the propagation format that should be used. Default value: B3.

SingleB3Header.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether one or multiple B3 headers should be used. Default value: true.

UseShortTraceIds.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether trace IDs should be truncated from 16 to 8 bytes in logs. Default value: false.
